title: String manipulation!
content: You probably saw the title of this course and thought to yourself, huh? How is 2 + 1 equal to 21? Don't worry we're going to get into the to why but the bigger focus of this course is to talk about string manipulation.

title: Why?
content: You're also probably wondering why string manipulation is so important? Most of the time a lot of the data you work with when creating websites or apps are usually strings, and in some cases, you need to perform magic like joining two sets of strings.

title: Adding strings

title: What the what...
content: Now let's get back to the title of this course, why does the statement below result in "21"? I know we discussed a whole course on numbers and how they work as expected in the real world as they do in JavaScript. In this case, pay closer attention to the values being added. You'll notice that the 2 is a String and 1 is number. Whenever you try to use the + sign with a String, JavaScript will convert any other value also to a String! So in this case, JavaScript will take 2 as a String, then convert 1 to a String and then join them together!
